quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ‘ATL Sarthi’?

A.      It has been launched by Atal Innovation Mission (AIM), NITI Aayog.

B.      As a pilot, AIM executed ATL Sarthi in regions like Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat.

C.      The initiative has three pillars ensuring the performance enhancement of ATLs.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, Ministry of AYUSH & Ministry of Rural Development have signed an MoU to collaborate in developing skilled personnel by imparting training for the Ayush healthcare system. The proposed training will be imparted under which of the following schemes?
options: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana 4.0
Pradhan Mantri ‘YUVA’ Yojana
Craftsmen Training Scheme (CTS)
Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Yojana

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the Deen Dayal Upadhyaya-Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY) scheme? 

A.      The beneficiaries include rural youth in age group of 15-45 years. 

B.      The scheme funds projects with minimum duration of 576 hours to 2304 hours. 

C.      The scheme has a 3-tier implementation model.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), In line with government’s ‘Waste to Wealth’ mission and encouraging environmentally sustainable National Highways construction, trial use of ‘Steel Slag’ in road construction has been initiated by NHAI. Waste to Wealth mission is one of the nine scientific missions of the Prime Minister’s Science, Technology & Innovation Advisory Council (PM-STIAC). Which of the following is not one of the scientific missions of the PMSTIAC?
options: Deep Ocean Exploration
Natural Language Translation
Natural & Organic Farming
Artificial Intelligence
BioScience for Human Health

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the National Rail Plan?

A.      Its objective is to increase the share of freight traffic from 28% to 44% by 2051.

B.      Reduce transit time of freight by increasing average speed of freight trains to 80 kmph.

C.      Railways to achieve its 100% electrification target by 2030.
options: A only
B and C
A and B
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Union Minister of Renewable Energy & Power has shared key information on solar energy capacity in India. Solar Capacity of India has increased by _______ in last 5 years.
options: 100%
160%
197%
235%
125%

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), the Minister for Earth Sciences has mentioned the applications related to weather forecasting. Which of the following applications is/are correctly matched with their objective?

A.      MAUSAM: for weather forecasting.

B.      Meghdoot: for lightning alert.

C.      Damini: for Agromet advisory dissemination.
options: A and B
B and C
A only
B only
C only

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) data shared by the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, 25 States/ UTs have set up __________ Tele Mental Health Assistance and Networking Across States (Tele-MANAS) Cells.
options: 25
50
56
64
36

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Ni-Kshay Mitra?

A.      It has been launched under Pradhan Mantri TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan.

B.      It has been developed by Central TB Division in collaboration with NITI Aayog.

C.      It provides four-pronged support.
options: A and B
A only
B and C
B only
A and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), information has been shared by Minister of Environment, Forest and climate change regarding measures taken by govt. to address the vagaries in Renewable energy generation and storage due to weather conditions. Which of the following measures is/are correctly mentioned below?
options: Construction of Intra-State and Inter-State transmission systems for evacuation of Renewable power.
Setting up of Renewable Energy Management Centers (REMCs) for accurate forecasting of renewable power.
Implementation of Green Term Ahead Market (GTAM) and Green Day Ahead Market (GDAM) for sale of renewable power.
Flexibility in Generation and Scheduling of Thermal/Hydro Power Stations through bundling with Renewable power and Storage Power.
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Ministry of environment, Forest and climate change has notified the e-waste (management) rules, 2022. Management of solar PV modules panels/ cells has been added in Chapter __________ of the said rules.
options: VIII
V
XII
III
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), a reply has been submitted by Minister of state for Environment, Forest and Climate change regarding plastic waste generated in the country during last 5 years. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to guidelines/targets under Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) for Plastic Packaging?

A.      Plastic packaging is categorized into 4 categories.

B.      Registration and filing of returns will take place on centralized portal of CPCB.

C.      Trading in EPR certificates is not allowed.
options: A and C
B and C
A and B
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Defence Acquisition Council, chaired by the Union Minister for Defence, has accorded Acceptance of Necessity for capital acquisition to the tune of Rs 70,500 crore for the Armed Forces & Indian Coast Guard under Buy {Indian-IDDM (Indigenously Designed, Developed and Manufactured)} category. Indian-IDDM refers to the procurement of products from an Indian vendor that have been indigenously designed, developed and manufactured with a minimum of ___________ Indigenous Content (IC) on cost basis of the total contract value.
options: 50%
40%
60%
75%
80%

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), to mark the International Women's Day (8 March), Union Minister of Science and technology announced an exclusive women's portal for research grants and funds.

Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to portal/grants?
options: It has been launched by CSIR (Council of Scientific & Industrial Research) under CSIR- ASPIRE.
The total budget of a research proposal should not exceed the limit of 25-30 lacs.
The funds will be provided for staff (JRF/SRF/RA), contingency and minor equipment.
It is to carry out Research and Development in major disciplines of science and engineering.
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), Adoption Regulations, 2022 has been mentioned in the Parliament. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Adoption Regulations, 2022?

A.      They have been framed by National Commission for Protection of Child Rights.

B.      Adoption order is issued by the court.

C.      For adoption of child below 2 years, the upper age limit for Prospective Adoptive Parents (PAPs) in case of single parent is 50 years.
options: C only
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Department of Land Resources under the Ministry of Rural Development has decided to organize Bhumi Samvaad IV on implementation of Unique Land Parcel Identification Number (ULPIN) or Bhu-Aadhaar at New Delhi. ULPIN is a unique ID of _________ digits for every plot of land in India
options: 12
16
8
14
10

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the 3rd Session of National Platform for Disaster Risk Reduction?

A.      Theme of the session was ‘Building Local Resilience in a Changing Climate’.

B.      It has been jointly organized by Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) and National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA), NDRF and NIDM.

C.      Session was chaired by the Prime Minister.
options: A and C
A and B
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: SENDAI Framework which is related to Disaster Risk Reduction was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2015
2019
2012
2009
2017

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) has made online document update in Aadhaar on myAadhar portal at what cost for next 3 months from 15th March 2023?
options: Rs 50
Rs 25
free of cost
Rs 10
Rs 5

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to “Mission Survey Antyodaya” (MAS)?
options: It was launched in 2017-18.
It is under the aegis of Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare.
Its main objective is conducting annual survey at the Gram Panchayat level to monitor the progress in the development process in rural areas.
1 and 2
2 and 3

quiz.text: India’s Biggest Youth Summit to Bring Together Young minds ‘National Youth Conclave 2023’ has recently been organized. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the conclave?
options: It has been organized by the Smart Cities Mission, MoHUA, Department of Youth Affairs and National Institute of Urban Affairs (NIUA).
It is aligning with Urban20 and Youth20 engagement groups.
It has been organized in Bengaluru, Gujarat.
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), a Memorandum of Understanding on establishing a ___________ supply chain and innovation partnership under the framework of India – US Commercial Dialogue has been signed between the two countries.
options: Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs)
Drone
Solar Panel
Lithium
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Atal Innovation Mission (AIM), NITI Aayog and the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (CSIRO), _________national science agency, have signed a Letter of Intent to encourage cooperation to drive innovation activities in areas of national challenges and shared priorities of both countries.
options: Japan’s
Australia’s
England’s
Canada’s
New Zealand’s

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the targets/objectives of National Steel Policy 2017?

A.      To develop crude steel capacity of 300 MT by 2030-31.

B.      To increase per capita steel consumption to 160 Kgs by 2030-31.

C.      To reduce import dependence on coking coal to 90% by 2030-31.
options: B and C
A and B
B only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: According to recent (March 2023) data released by the Ministry of Steel, total quantity of recycled steel used in various sectors is approximately ________ Million Tonnes (MT).
options: 60
50
30
45
65

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), which of the following ministries has launched High Price DAM and PUShP portal?
options: Ministry of Finance
Ministry of Power
Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry of Commerce and Industry

quiz.text: High price day ahead market (HP-DAM) is an innovative initiative by the Ministry of Power and Regulator (CERC) to bring additional power to the market by use of power generated from____________, in the high demand period"
options: bio-fuel
nuclear fuel
solar and wind
high-cost fuels
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), an information is shared by Minister of state for Micro Small and Medium Enterprises regarding grievance Redressal through Samadhan Portal. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to MSME SAMADHAAN Portal?

A.      It is a delayed payment monitoring system.

B.      It was launched in 2017.

C.      It’s special sub-portal with an objective to report the dues and monthly payments by central ministries/departments/PSEs to MSMEs was launched in 2020.
options: A and C
A only
C only
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: e-Verification Scheme had been notified by CBDT (central board of direct taxes) in the year _____ under the provisions of Income Tax Act, 1961.
options: 2017
2015
2018
2020
2021

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), 'Her Healthy Farm Recipe' campaign has been launched by which of the following entities?
options: PRADAN
Foundation for Ecological Security (FES)
AidEnvironment
National Coalition for Natural Farming (NCNF)
All of the above
